languages.text: "Что там любит чернь? Выдать всем амасек и устроить бои среди крепких сервов".

traits.locale_text: "Что там любит чернь? Выдать всем амасек и устроить бои среди крепких сервов".

languages.text: "Now what does the rabble like to see... Give out enough amasec for everyone and hold fights between tougher serfs."
languages.original_text: "Что там любит чернь? Выдать всем амасек и устроить бои среди крепких сервов".

traits.locale_text: "Now what does rabble like to see... Prepare enough amasec for everyone and hold fights between tougher serfs."
"Now what does rabble like to see... Prepare enough amasec for everyone and hold fights between tougher serfs."
"Now what does the rabble like to see... Give out enough amasec for everyone and hold fights between tougher serfs."
"Now what does the rabble like to see... Give out enough amasec for everyone and hold fights between tougher serfs."
"Now what does the rabble like to see... Give out enough amasec for everyone and hold fights between tougher serfs."

languages.text: 「さて、民衆が好むのは…。全員にアマセックを存分にふるまい、屈強な農奴たちの間で闘技を催せ」
languages.original_text: "Now what does the rabble like to see... Give out enough amasec for everyone and hold fights between tougher serfs."

traits.locale_text: 「さて、民衆が好むのは…。全員にアマセックを存分にふるまい、屈強な農奴たちの間で闘技を催せ」

languages.text: “既然是那群乌合之众喜欢的东西……就让他们开怀畅饮艾玛赛克酒，再挑几个强壮的农奴来场比武什么的吧。”
languages.original_text: "Now what does the rabble like to see... Give out enough amasec for everyone and hold fights between tougher serfs."

traits.locale_text: “既然是那群乌合之众喜欢的东西……就让他们开怀畅饮艾玛赛克酒，再挑几个强壮的农奴来场比武什么的吧。”

languages.text: «Vamos a ver. Qué le gusta a la plebe... Que repartan amasec para todos y organicen peleas entre los campesinos más fornidos».
languages.original_text: "Now what does the rabble like to see... Give out enough amasec for everyone and hold fights between tougher serfs."

traits.locale_text: «Vamos a ver. Qué le gusta a la plebe... Que repartan amasec para todos y organicen peleas entre los campesinos más fornidos».

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce qui pourrait bien faire plaisir à ces manants... Je sais. Faites distribuer de l'amasec et organisez des combats entre les serfs les plus coriaces. »
languages.original_text: "Now what does the rabble like to see... Give out enough amasec for everyone and hold fights between tougher serfs."

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-ce qui pourrait bien faire plaisir à ces manants… Je sais. Faites distribuer de l'amasec et organisez des combats entre les serfs les plus coriaces. »

languages.text: "Also, was will der Pöbel ...? Gebt Amasec für alle aus und veranstaltet Kämpfe zwischen härteren Leibeigenen."
languages.original_text: "Now what does the rabble like to see... Give out enough amasec for everyone and hold fights between tougher serfs."

traits.locale_text: "Also, was will der Pöbel ...? Gebt Amasec für alle aus und veranstaltet Kämpfe zwischen härteren Leibeigenen."

languages.text: "Ayaktakımı ne ister düşünelim... Herkese yetecek kadar amasek dağıtın ve güçlü kuvvetli kullar arasında kavgalar düzenleyin."
languages.original_text: "Now what does the rabble like to see... Give out enough amasec for everyone and hold fights between tougher serfs."

traits.locale_text: "Ayaktakımı ne ister düşünelim... Herkese yetecek kadar amasek dağıtın ve kart kullar arasında kavgalar düzenleyin."
